name: FireStarter (itch) (Boblin's Hoard)
description:
Made for mini jam 124: warmth. This was made in a little under 72 hours. 
Play as a small fire creature trying to start the fires that keep it alive. While being chased by hordes of water drops and twig enemies collect sticks and light the campfires, and once you have enough sticks, the final brazier.
